Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 18th overall pick, by Los Angeles (A) in 2014...
Injured on 4/20/2015 with a Bruised Hand, out for 2 days...
Injured on 6/10/2015 with a Broken Finger, out for 5 weeks...
Traded from Los Angeles (A) to Cleveland on 2/6/2016 (Going to LAA: P Cole Hamels. Going to CLE: C Luis Torres, P Daniel Tillman, SS Franchy Cordero)...
Injured on 7/28/2017 with a Fractured Wrist, out for 5 weeks...
Had first career hit on 5/29/2018, off Tyler Skaggs (DET)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/3/2018, off Michael Wacha (NYY)...
